title: Ping spikes after patch 7.17 (Internet is fine)
body:
After patch 7.17 my ping has been jumping up and down from 40 to 100 to 200 and down to 40 again for a minute or two, then it all repeats again.
My internet is working as well as it always have. I never had this problem before the recent patch.

replies.body: Even if your internet is fine you can still run into blocks reaching specific servers.  You might be experiencing packet loss if it's sudden like this, but a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) can really help us know for sure.  Run a few logs of the impacted games, and let me know what you find!
